G

GameBoard - Class in main
Tracks parameters and methods related to the size and shape of the gameboard in use.
GameBoard(int, int) - Constructor for class main.GameBoard
Create a new game board
GameController - Class in main
Provides access to the gameboard and the player list, as well as running general game settings.
GameController(int, int) - Constructor for class main.GameController
Create a new GameController object with a GameBoard of the given width and height.
gameController - Variable in class main.ViewApplication
The GameController object that manages Game objects and gameplay.
GameObject - Class in main
An abstract class for creating objects within the game, like Turtle or Line objects.
GameObject() - Constructor for class main.GameObject
 
generateLocationChange(String) - Method in class main.Command
Given a single input, will create a new LocationChange object with either a move or a turn.
getCommandInputs() - Method in class main.Command
Get the ArrayList of String inputs.
getCommands() - Method in class main.ViewApplication.PlayerTextFields
 
getCurrentLocation() - Method in class main.GameObject
Return the current location
getEndLocation() - Method in class main.Line
Return the end location
getHeight() - Method in class main.GameBoard
Return the board height
getInvalidCommandLineNumber() - Method in class main.Command
Return the invalid command line number, which will be an empty ArrayList if all the entered commands are valid.
getLength() - Method in class main.Line
Get the total length of the line.
getMove() - Method in class main.LocationChange
Return the number of steps
getName() - Method in class main.ViewApplication.PlayerTextFields
 
getNextLocation() - Method in class main.Command
Go through the Commands in order, and return the next LocationChange object in the sequence.
getNumPlayers() - Method in class main.PlayerList
Get the number of players.
getObjectColor() - Method in class main.GameObject
Get the color of the object
getObjects() - Method in class main.GameController
Function that returns all objects following a step of the game.
getOrientation() - Method in class main.Location

getPlayer(int) - Method in class main.PlayerList
Get a player object
getPlayerColor() - Method in class main.Player

getPlayerColors() - Method in class main.PlayerList

getPlayerLines() - Method in class main.Player
Get the arraylist of Line objects controlled by the players
getPlayerList() - Method in class main.PlayerList

getPlayerName() - Method in class main.Player
Return the Player name
getPlayerObjects() - Method in class main.Player
Get all the GameObjects controlled by the Player, including the Turtle and the Line objects.
getPlayers() - Method in class main.GameController

getStartLocation() - Method in class main.Line

getTurn() - Method in class main.LocationChange
